title: The Writer's Almanac - Friday, May 29, 2020
description: It was on this day in 1913 that the world premiere of Igor Stravinsky's “Le Sacre du printemps” caused a riot at the Théâtre des Champs-Élysées in Paris.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It was on this day in 1913 that the world premiere of Igor Stravinsky's “Le Sacre du printemps” caused a riot at the Théâtre des Champs-Élysées in Paris.
